ITEM.szItemDesc: If 8 rounds of Glaser Safety ammo fail to make your point, the conversation wasn't worth having to begin with.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Eight rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Introduced in 1979 under the design of Jeff Cooper, 10mm ammo shares the dimensions, but not the popularity, of .40 S&W.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Developed for its stopping power, 10mm is not an uncommon ordninance for police and counter-terrorist agents.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of 10mm hollow point puts enemies out of the fight permanently.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 10mm HP is perfect for detering persistent foes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of armor piercing ammo in 10mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Targets in armor are no match for an AP round in their 10 ring.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The pinnacle of terminal ballistics combines armor defeating capability with the punch of a hollow point bullet in one small deadly package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 10mm AET doesn't brake for armor or tough organic matter. Burn down the burliest opponent regardless of ballistic armor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If 30 rounds of Glaser Safety ammo fail to make your point, the conversation wasn't worth having to begin with.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Thirty rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of match quality 10mm add to the range of your 10mm SMG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Increased range and performance are features of this hard hitting round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 30rnd magazine for the SR-2 Veresk machinepistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Now available: 30rnd mags vor the Veresk!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This five-shot speedloader of 12.5x35mm rounds is for the massive U-94S UDAR Revolver.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Owing its dimensions to the 32 gauge shotgun shell, the 12.5mm is a weighty round for a weighty handgun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 9x21mm was specially designed to punch through body armor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: According to its press, 9x21mm's tungsten core enables it to penetrate armored targets from 100 meters away.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed so snipers punch through helmets, not the sound barrier.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 7.62 armor piercing ammo is designed especially for silenced sniper rifles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Deal out armor penetration and radiation damage from a suppressed rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Deliver a tactical nuclear strike on the smallest possible scale from your silenced sniper rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 5.45x18mm clip fits the diminutive PSM pistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 8 round magazine of 5.45x18mm ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 5.45x18mm hollow point magazine for the PSM.
ITEM.szBRDesc: HP bullets augment the stopping power of this small-bore cartridge.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Dispensing with mechanical loading and firing, Metal Storm's stacked electronically fired ammunition promises reliable mass firepower at low weight. This bundle is configured for 72 rounds across 6 barrels, in 9mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Dispensing with mechanical loading and firing, Metal Storm's stacked electronically fired ammunition promises reliable mass firepower at low weight. This bundle is configured for 72 rounds across 6 barrels, in 9mm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Two 12 gauge slugs for your 12 gauge slug-gun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Deer hunting or man-hunting, a pair of shotgun slugs will put the quarry down.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Chamber these 12ga buckshot shells and proclaim with impunity: "This is my boomstick!"
ITEM.szBRDesc: Open up with a shower of buckshot and attackers will dissolve before your eyes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you're going to use an overpriced, impractical and unreliable handgun instead of a perfectly good rifle, you'll need ammunition for it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Magazine size, accuracy and controlability are a fair trade off for stopping power and coolness, right? Still legally the largest caliber for domestic use under the national firearms act.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 40-round magazine contains specialized 4.6mm AET ammunition for the HK MP-7.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Specialized ammunition for your HK MP-7. These advanced energy transference bullets are about as large as a rifle round and explode into multiple pieces on impact, creating multiple wound channels.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Tracer ammunition in 5.45mm caliber. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: "Walking" burst fire onto a target has never been so easy with this 30-round magazine of 5.45mm ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 10 rounds of tracer ammunition in 7.62x39mm. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ranging and shot placement (and detection) are even easier with 10 rounds of 7.62x39mm tracer.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of tracer ammunition in 7.62x39mm. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Have your own private light show (without the aid of psychadelic drugs)when you put 30 rounds of 7.62x39mm tracer in the air.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Tracer ammunition in 5.45mm caliber. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Light up the night (or day) with a whopping 45-round mag of 5.45mm tracer ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ranging and shot placement are easy with 10 rounds of 7.62 Russian tracer. Tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and full-auto modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ranging and shot placement are easy with 10 rounds of 7.62 Russian tracer. Tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and full-auto modes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This drum contains 100 rounds of 7.62 Warsaw Pact hollow point ammo. Although use of this round against light armored opponents can sway a battle in your favor, it's less effective against heavy armor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When killing them is simply not enough. A huge 100-round drum of 7.62mm Hollow Point is a great way to send the point home in true brain splattering style.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 7-round FMJ clip for the .50 Beowulf Rifle
ITEM.szBRDesc: 7 rounds of the highpowered .50 Beowulf ammo, just the thing for stopping vehicles.

ITEM.szBRDesc: A clip of 7 Hollow Point rounds, perfect for harassing big pussycats.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This speed loader holds 6 rounds of .357 Magnum AET ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Penetrate enemy armor without fear of overpenetration with these french made AET rounds..

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 9 rounds of .357 Magnum AET ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Even if the enemy's armor stops all else, it won't stop these!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 6 rounds of .45 WinMag Hollow Point ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you're a hunter, then you'll need this for your sidearm if your prey is not as dead as you believed on first sight...

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 6 rounds of .45 WinMag Armor Piercing ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Armor piercing ammo for the Wildey pistol and other .45 WinMag pistols.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This speed loader holds 5 rounds of .454 Casull ammunition, right for your handcannon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: .454 Casull is a round developed for some truly large revolvers.

ITEM.szBRDesc: .454 Casull Hollow Point ammunition, if you use your revolver for hunting.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 5 rounds of .454 Casull Armor Piercing ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: .454 Casull Armor Piercers meet any need for self-defense ammo.

ITEM.szBRDesc: A .454 Casull Armor Piercer, if you want to shock the rangemaster at your next silhouette-training.

ITEM.szBRDesc: Original Thompson M1928 Drum, loaded with standard rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 50 rounds of hollowpoint ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This drum of hollowpoint ammunition is suitable to saw through a tree, or anything else that stands in your way.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 50 rounds of AP ammo in a springloaded drum.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Armor piercing ammo for serious homedefense. Whoever attacks you will run out of ammo before you do!

ITEM.szItemDesc: A drum filled with the highly effective AET ammo. Just check your gun carefully after firing this whole drum...

ITEM.szItemDesc: 50 rounds of frangible Glaser ammunition will shred any soft target into tiny little pieces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 50 rounds of frangible Glaser ammunition will shred any soft target into tiny little pieces.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Though it seems to be a waste, someone filled this drum with Match ammo...
